definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The old EW taxiway has been partially removed.
sentences.chinese: 旧的电子战滑行道已被部分删除。

sentences.english: The clover on the taxiway stands in dew and cold of the night.
sentences.chinese: 滑行道上的覆盖物带着露水矗立在夜雾中。

sentences.english: The taxiway bridge have been built for long years and with high loading.
sentences.chinese: 机场滑行道桥建筑年限久，荷载大，断交难。

sentences.english: Ag: (CCA1123) taxi to gate (3) via taxiway (V2).
sentences.chinese: 可以滑行至3号桥，使用v2滑行道。

sentences.english: Caution walk men on the taxiway.
sentences.chinese: 注意滑行道上散步的人们。

definition: (of aircraft) to take off and land
the rear (tail) of a plane etc
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
